title: Valheim is Steam's Newest Viral Hit -  Kinda Funny Games Daily 02.15.21
description:
Blessing and Fran kick off the week talking about huge sales for Valheim, possible hope for Stadia, and more.

00:00:00 - Start
00:04:10 - Housekeeping
Tomorrow is an Avenger’s War Table which means we’ll be reacting to it. Join Greg and a cast of misfits tomorrow at 9am Pacific Time to check out what’s coming to the world of Marvel’s Avengers. That’s happening right here on Twitch.tv/KindaFunnyGames.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: GrahamOfLegend, David Meintel, Trent Berrie, Black Jack, Luiz Aguiar (@8bitLuiz), James Davis (@JamesDavisMakes), &The Nano Biologist
The Roper Report   -
00:11:05 - Valheim is Steam's Biggest Ever Launch for a Survival Game - Matt Purslow @ IGN
00:22:10 - The first PS5 drift class action lawsuit has been filed against Sony - Marie Dealessandri @ GiBiz
00:28:15 - Remedy Entertainment Just Had a Record Financial Year without releasing a single game - Matt Purslow @ IGN
00:36:28 -  Ad  
00:41:09 - Google Stadia is Getting More Than 100 Games In 2021 - Eddie Makuch @ Gamespot
00:51:00 - Metro Exodus is getting an enhanced edition - Sal Romano @ Gematsu
00:53:20 - Out today
00//;56:15 - Squad Up:Alex Irish(Xbox) - Alex IR esq
00:57:05 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Greg and Gary Whitta
